website_summaries.verdict: At about one-third of the cost of some of the other living room floor lamps, the Ikea Holmo offers a good value for its low price but may not be as durable as others on our shortlist.
pros: Users appreciate the beautiful ambient lighting, simple assembly, and excellent price point
cons: Some users feel that this lamp is less durable than the other living room floor lamps on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Only takes 1 bulb per lamp
customer_reviews.text: The one I bought from an Ikea store a few years ago took 3 bulbs at different heights within the lamp giving it an overall glowing look. This lamp takes one bulb directly at mid-height and honestly it looks stupid. Not sure if this is how Ikea is making them nowadays or if this is not a true Ikea product. Either way, this lamp looks dopey.
customer_reviews.author: K Shick

customer_reviews.title: Good for an office or apartment
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to move to another state for a Big work project and we set up his apartment. These worked great! 2 in the living room and one in the bedroom. Good quality and nice ambiance
customer_reviews.author: Marlies Fitch Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected but I guess still cute.
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I thought they would be but I guess I'll figure something out to accommodate and I guess I don't mind going to buy bulbs even though it advertises "+ 2 LED BULBS" ....that was false advertising! The picture I posted demos how tall they really are and how I'm going to have to find tables to make them taller.
customer_reviews.author: Alita Mariee

customer_reviews.title: We like the way the light is diffused by the shade.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the wide spread of light from the paper tube. The foot switch is a nice touch if you’re not using smart bulbs. The base has enough heft to keep it from tipping. My only complaint, and a little one at that, was the instructions were a little vague on how to connect the bottom of the paper shade. Hint: pull pass the ring and push toward the shaft and let go.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Bedroom redo
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and very reasonably priced. They came as a set. Love the finished look .
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Kolmer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but not cheap if you know what I mean. Ingenious design. All the parts fit together precisely. The base is heavy. The plastic parts are sturdy. The foot switch gives a satisfying click. Amazing quality for a crazy low price - if you live near an IKEA it's only $13 including LED bulb! I plan on using them for a patio seating area (note: not outdoor rated). Of course they will be indoors when not in use; the rice paper shades are not exactly weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much of a review is necessary for lamps. They were easy to assemble and worked without issue out of the box. I bought them as accent pieces in my drum room, and replaced the stock bulbs with some smart bulbs purchased from Amazon as well, this way I can change light colors using Google Home :) If anyone is interested in the bulbs I used in the lamps, here ya go:
customer_reviews.author: Myk Robinson

customer_reviews.title: These work perfect for my purpose.  Great size and decor.
customer_reviews.text: They would look great as an offset or more illumination when needed or wanted. I wish I knew what happened to the table lamps. I DID RECEIVE 6 OF THEM AND NEED TO HAVE 4 RETURNED. No one seems to want to help rectify this problem. I will be sending a check for 2 floor lamps @ $12.99 each, light bulbs and ice scoops but that is all is you will receive from me. Please arrange to have your other merchandise picked up (the two floor lamps which bow out, the 4 additional floor lamps by HOLMO) and I will pay for the table lamps once I receive them. Thank you for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love <3
customer_reviews.text: I really love these lamps for the price! Love the floor switch also. I would buy these again! Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: D. Potter

customer_reviews.title: It'll do
customer_reviews.text: It looked far better in the photos. For the cost, I shouldn't complain though. However the shades literally look like oversized dryer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdaddy3

customer_reviews.title: And then there was light...
customer_reviews.text: In a world of darkness there came an Amazon delivery and brought light into my life! After some quick assembly my somber nights of stubbed toes and bumped heads I can now see the holy mess that I have in my room. Thank you Ikea and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamps, one of the clips broke
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps. Look really cool and were exactly the vibe I was looking for. Glad I didn’t settle for one of the first results when I looked up “cool lamps”. They’re decently bright — they came with 2 led bulbs. And they stand at a reasonable height. Cons - The only con I have is that one of the clips that keep the cord snug to the pole broke when trying to squeeze it back on. Use care when doing those.
customer_reviews.author: MSnakeK

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value and have worked out well in my daughter’s ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and have worked out well in my daughter’s room. They look good and are holding up to all of her pets. Luckily they haven’t been interested in them.
customer_reviews.author: dmgmommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cost effective floor lamps
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and stylish floor lamps! I am currently using these with milight bulbs installed (cheaper alternative to Phillips hue) Light diffuses very well against the wall and surrounding objects. I would prefer the other model that has 3 bulbs per lamp so I may upgrade in the future. These fit well with any decor. I was afraid my cat would destroy them but I found she just rubs against them but there is no damage to the shade whatsoever. Easy to assemble and position.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to assemble and they look great. I really like the height. I can put them in the floor and still be about 4' tall or I can put them on a table and have them at least 5' real. I think they are a great accent to the room. I'm totally getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bywater

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They are a lot brighter than expected and look great in our living room. The price for the two pack was awesome! The assembly was super easy and I love that you can use a regular light bulb in these!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fragile.
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but flimsy. Not kid proof. It’s very easy to install and works well. The shade is made up o a thin paper and it’s not meant to be around rough and tumble kids or rambunctious dogs. I purchased extra lamps for to replace any broken ones. Loved the design!!
customer_reviews.author: Myo Aung

customer_reviews.title: Theyre an awkward height
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, although it's weird the instructions are on 2 pieces of paper and not together. The pack is a great value and I love that it even comes with light bulbs. Easy assembly. But as I said I wish it was taller. The height is awkward and I feel like it's like a $2 fix for them to add another piece of metal to extend it. But whatever. It's nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Megan Christina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bedroom and I absolutely love them. They look lovely. They’re not that big though, so I put them on my nightstands. They light up a medium size room nicely. They only take 1 bulb each, right in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe rocha

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I Thought
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lamp that looked exactly like this that was bought from Ikea. Totally my fault that I didn't double check the measurements, but it is fairly tiny. However, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! They give off a nice light, easy to put together and came with bulbs. Perfect for our room!
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this lamp, very unusual and striking. The drawback is that it is very flimsy--the arc is not secured and can tilt easily instead of staying upright. Great for an adult environment where no one will touch touch the shade, not so great with little curious kids.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, perfect for night stands
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble. Perfect for night stands. Can be used with smart bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: B Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Broken lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: Super cute lamps but one of them came completely destroyed and unusable. So disappointed and unhappy with this, as I’ve been waiting over a week for this item to put into my new office
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super small lamps
customer_reviews.text: I’m super upset, I thought the lamps where tall, they are mini lamps, I needed the tall floor lamps, I was very disappointed, I won’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Washington

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps. Shorter than expected. Cheaper at Ikea.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, with all advertised pieces. Easy to assemble. Sturdy base. Decent quality paper shades. Yes, shorter than expected, but that's my fault for not paying attention, as description clearly states 46" height. Overall, good product, but returning because it's $12.99 for 1 at Ikea - with the lightbulb. I appreciate you anyway, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Theng

customer_reviews.title: I like these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights; however, they are not as bright as I need them to be. Still, I really do like them and they were easy to assemble. I have them sitting up on my computer desk. I am happy that I purchased these and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Candace MiddletonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bedroom lights
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the paper might rip or it would be bad quality but it's not, and it's very strong paper. They look very nice in my bedroom, there was no overhead lighting so they provide the perfect mood lighting.
customer_reviews.author: KyleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Value but have some patience putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase great value only thing is the assembly have patience 2 pieces screw together the final bar screws into the light bracket ( light protector) on top to complete assembly it was so simple but if you saw me trying to put it together you would die laughing Check you tube for help if you have questions...
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, I love them. They are a lot shorter than I expected but it ended up complimenting my room a lot. They offer a soft glow to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Bring like to a dark world
customer_reviews.text: The perfect item to light up vary dark corners in my current housing. Changes the corner from a creepy dark area to a room highlight! (The shades are made from paper so would not recommend these for households with a cat who likes to scratch or toddlers who like to tear paper.)
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mike

customer_reviews.title: They are an awesome package with light bulbs and all
customer_reviews.text: They are an awesome package with light bulbs and all! Yes they're paper and that bothers some people but you can't tell by just looking at them. They are urban sheeck and look great as floor lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these lamps a great review, but I paid for two and only got one. When this is remedied, I will upgrade my review. The one lamp I got is cute and is exactly what I expected, The assembly took minutes and done.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: You can control how bright the light needs to be with the lightbulb you install. I love the button on/off switch. You can use your hand or your foot depending on where you put your lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I hate assembling things but this was super easy. It looks cheaper in person but for the price I can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect office lighting for a small business
customer_reviews.text: We have bought many of these lamps to fill in areas of the office that need light. We love this product and we will be buying more. The two-pack purchase option is really exciting because it allows for us to save money while adding more light to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Alive Holistic

customer_reviews.title: love the floor pedal shades seem little cheap though
customer_reviews.text: the paper-like shades seem little bit cheaper to me, but the lighting is great and I love the floor pedal to step on, makes it easy when I'm carrying the baby and can just step on it. super easy to set up if u follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambiance lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Exactly what I was looking for. Give nice ambience for a yoga class. Make sure you get two though I only got one delivered but got it resolved and got the other one . Easy to put together .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice for the price. I’m super happy with my floor lamps. My only criticism is that they were shorter than I expected. But you can NOT beat these for the price. Easy to set up. Nice glow. Love the foot pedal button.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lamps for my son who is in the Navy and he LOVES them! They are a great addition to his apartment! Shipping was fast and the lamps arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps. They make the ambiance in the room perfect in our spa.
customer_reviews.author: n.lehr

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (I assembled both alone in about 30 mins). Light up my yoga room with a soft light that looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality lamps especially for the money. Very easy to assemble and give a quite dramatic effect.
customer_reviews.author: jtp

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The shade could be much better but for the price and what it is, it's great. Would love to be able to buy replacement shades easily.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: 45 INCHES BUT MAD CUTE
customer_reviews.text: THEY LIKE 45 INCHES.. 1 on each side THOUGHT I MEASURED HOWEVER STILL GOOD FOR WHAT I WANTED THEY CUTE, I PURCHASED THE BULBS BUT PERSONALLY I FEEL U CAN GET WHICHEVER ...HAVE FUN WITH COLORS...RED BLUE GREEN..CAN GET AT BARGAIN STORES.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY📹

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Use them everyday in the living room have 3 of them, use a different everyday of the week. When I have guest over during the day I use them to give this place color....
customer_reviews.author: Raul Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint but lots of light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two. They were very simple to assemble and give me more light than I had expected.They take up less space
customer_reviews.author: The Frog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Trendy lamps of quality that add a modern touch to my dark room
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Nolder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love that you can turn it on with the foot pedal.
customer_reviews.author: F. Tells

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, and easy to assemble. It USA but short than I expected. It reaches my hips and I’m 5 foot and 4 inches. However, we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are a good bargain for their price. They are easy to put together and give a soft look to the entire room. May not be the sturdiest to have around, esp if you have small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Smriti

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps- great price
customer_reviews.text: These are in my sunroom for a nice, soft evening light. It looks like they have modified the assembly and construction for the better also.
customer_reviews.author: Mogwan

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two lamps but one of them is missing a plastic piece that holds the lampshade. Would be great to get the replacement rather than have to take apart both lights and mail them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, well packed, very easy assemble. The base is heavy, makes the lamp study. The quality of materials Is pretty good. The soft lighting makes the room very calm.
customer_reviews.author: yevans

customer_reviews.title: It's a lamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks very nice. Not the sturdiest, but what are you expecting for the style and the price. Makes me wish there was an ikea closer than 3 hours away.
customer_reviews.author: KiriyaAoi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hue bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these lamps around the house now and all of them are using Hue bulbs. All look so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. However the paper is already coming apart from the wire part at the top. So it’s completely falling apart after only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnifer

customer_reviews.title: Short and cheap like my ex boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: The lamps were short and cheap looking! Very disappointed. The assembly was very hard.
customer_reviews.author: We-Z-Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the lamps. Good light for casual room illumination (wstching TV). Good styling.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Armstrong

customer_reviews.text: Iconic duo. I am feeling Like a bougie queen with my mood lighting :)
customer_reviews.author: 🐚🐝 Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Function over form
customer_reviews.text: As with most IKEA products, these lamps are cheaply made but do their job at a good price. Easy to assmble and look nice. LED light bulbs are not included, though!
customer_reviews.author: Alex “Sandy”

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic lamps
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable lamps. A little flimsy but you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: What a great find! These lamps add a soft indirect light with a modern twist.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Smart lights
customer_reviews.text: I Love these. Works just as expected, quality isn't the best but I'm still satisfied. I use mines with Magiclight bulbs that change colors.
customer_reviews.author: GoGo Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good lights for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lights are nice for the price. Easy to assemble and good amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Main rod will not stay straight upright, have to keep tightening bolt on bottom. Looks are just ok. Going to keep them but *meh*
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Bailey

customer_reviews.title: More than my money's worth
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be really crappy considering how cheap they are, I was wrong however! They look amazing and feel sturdy enough to last year's! I'm so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the money. Probably should be priced lower in my opinion. But they work fine and look decent.
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice accept lamp
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated because it was so inexpensive. They are simple, but nice looking. Assemble them carefully. I tore a hole in the paper of one of mine
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: They look great! I'm very happy with these lights! Best of all, my electric bill should drop too!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalLily66

customer_reviews.title: Caution missing critical piece in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps and put them together with ease however, both lamps are missing the piece that attaches the cord to the lamp stem. Without the clip, the cord dangles and looks awful - completely destroys the look of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Cal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buy light bulbs.  It does not some with item.
customer_reviews.text: The item was easy to put together. The clasp to hold the cord next to the lamp pole was missing out of both boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Shade is incredibly fragile but a good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the foot switch and the overall look is good Cons: the paper shade is flimsy and tears easily. Additionally, the support of the shade is rather odd
customer_reviews.author: Mat Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Unstable lamps- shades do not mount evenly and have to keep readjusting
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an office
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for an office setting. Ambient light and causal. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kanuanuhea

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are really nice and easy to put together. Just perfect for the rooms I have them placed in.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Crawford Sr.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING quality and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps. Great quality for the price. Would HIGHLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shute

customer_reviews.title: Only one lamped worked and LED bulbs were not included
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamps, but unfortunately only one was working. The product detail also notes that LED bulbs are included, however none arrived with the order. Returning the non-working lamp and hoping the next one I purchase will be in working order.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamps, easy to put together, no tools required, they look elegant with a clean touch!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Complement any decor
customer_reviews.text: Love the contemporary look...gives nice light... conversation piece...has Asian feel...very nice
customer_reviews.author: kat v

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out great in my livingroom. I love the foot paddle thingy. It is really convenient for me. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look these lamps give a room....
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Useful, not for people who want their living room to look classy.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. It is great for kids bedrooms or a dorm room. Not good for living rooms that wanna look classy.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Not a floor lamp, u less you live in a hobbit house. Absolute crap.
customer_reviews.author: Clean Hippie

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: these are not floor lamps...they are very short, like 2 feet tall...if you are looking for lamps to sit on the floor, do not buy these....
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lamps. They brighten my living room far better then my previous lighting. I would buy these again if and when need
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P.

customer_reviews.title: But love the design and the paper
customer_reviews.text: The base isnt heavy enough to keep lamp straight it tilts a little. But love the design and the paper covers
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tipsy but all in all it lights up the room
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Klafka

customer_reviews.title: Too costly for ONE lamp
customer_reviews.text: It says set of 2 only 1 came in the box
customer_reviews.author: Lala916

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ikea lamp for an easy solution
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are ok, they look nice in the living room and are very easy to assemble. I like them and if you take care of them they will last.
customer_reviews.author: ecate

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to assemble. It looks great in my man cave room setup. Fits perfectly on both sides of a tv stand. Also works great with a LIFX color changing light bulb that you can control with your smartphone. Would definitely recommend for a modern cool look.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Guzman

customer_reviews.title: accent lamp
customer_reviews.text: nice lamp. It is thin and doesn't give off a lot of light. I wish they had put another bulb or two so more light would come from this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of ambient light
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights for my office. It provides plenty of ambient light, eliminating the harsh overhead light. Everyone that comes into my office comments on the pleasant light and cool atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Mendi Poppie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps, especially since you turn them on and off with your foot. Don't do it in front of a 2 year old. They will copy you, and never stop turning it on and off lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nadra McClain

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, especially for the price! Soft glow, very relaxing, perfect for my massage space.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lamps they are brighter than what I was expecting and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dariann

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Really easy to put together. They arrived like a week earlier than expected. Brightens up my living room just enough :)
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and one can light up a small room no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Em Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lights offer an inexpensive way to add ambient lighting to any space.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Not for children
customer_reviews.text: Light weight paper cover does not hold up with kids. Feels flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Ikea Floor Lamp, 46-inch, White (White, 2)
product_meta.description: Size:Set of 2 (HOLMO Lamp NO Light BulbLight bulb sold separately. IKEA recommends LEDARE LED bulb E26 400 lumen globe opal white. Use an opal light bulb if you have an ordinary lamp shade or lamp and want an even, diffused distribution of light. Base: Polyethylene, Concrete Cover: Polypropylene Expander/ Tube: Steel, Powder coating Shade: Rice paper
feature_bullets: Product dimensions Height: 46 " Shade diameter: 9 " Cord length: 7 ' 3 "
Care instructions Dust the lamp with a dust cloth.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars605 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
